widget.name: Feedback Notification
widget.description: Widget used to add notifications to your application. Based on https://github.com/fkhadra/react-toastify

property.caption: Notification Text
property.description: Text to show in the notification.

property.caption: Type
property.description: Can be used to set a type for the toast message, which will change the styling and add a icon. Type can be "info", "success", "warning", "error" or "default". Make sure you write it correctly.

property.caption: Theme
property.description: Can be used to set a theme for the toast message, which will change the styling. Theme can be "light", "dark" or "colored". Make sure you write it correctly.

property.caption: Class
property.description: Class to give to a specific notification.

property.caption: Theme
property.description: Theme the notifications.

property.caption: On Show Action
property.description: Action to trigger the notification is shown, e.g. to commit the object such that the notification is not shown again.

property.caption: On Close Action
property.description: Action to trigger the notification is closed.

property.caption: Position
property.description: Position of the notification.

property.caption: Transition
property.description: How the notification will pop up on the screen.

property.caption: Show Icon
property.description: Whether or not to show the default icons. Can be set per notification if needed.

property.caption: Hide progress bar
property.description: Whether or not to show the progress bar.

property.caption: Pause on hover
property.description: Whether or not to pause the timer when hovering over the notification.

property.caption: Pause on focus loss
property.description: Whether or not to pause the timer when the window loses focus.

property.caption: Right to left
property.description: Show content right to left.

property.caption: Newest on top
property.description: Show newest notification on top.

property.caption: Limit
property.description: Limit amount of notifications to be shown at the same time. 0 means no limit.

property.caption: Close after notification
property.description: Used to overwrite above property for a specific notification.

property.caption: Close button
property.description: Whether or not to show a close button.

property.caption: Close on click
property.description: Close notification when clicked.

property.caption: Draggable
property.description: Whether or not the notification can be dragged to close it.

property.caption: Draggable percent
property.description: The percentage of the notifications width that the notification can be dragged after which it will be closed.
